code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Header=()=>{const location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"bg-slate-800 text-white p-4 shadow-md",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto flex flex-col md:flex-row justify-between items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"text-xl font-bold mb-4 md:mb-0",children:"Blockchain & Web Dev Bootcamp"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"flex space-x-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:`hover:text-blue-300 transition-colors ${location.pathname==='/'?'text-blue-400 font-semibold':''}`,children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/new",className:`hover:text-blue-300 transition-colors ${location.pathname==='/new'?'text-blue-400 font-semibold':''}`,children:"New Lecture"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/archive",className:`hover:text-blue-300 transition-colors ${location.pathname==='/archive'?'text-blue-400 font-semibold':''}`,children:"Archive"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/notes",className:`hover:text-blue-300 transition-colors ${location.pathname==='/notes'?'text-blue-400 font-semibold':''}`,children:"My Notes"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/nft-studio",className:`hover:text-blue-300 transition-colors ${location.pathname==='/nft-studio'?'text-blue-400 font-semibold':''}`,children:"NFT Studio"})})]})})]})});};export default Header;
